# Government Tender Announcement

## Title

* English: Mattress, Prisoner, High Risk
* French: Matelas, prisonnier, haut risque

## Reference and Solicitation Information
* Reference Number: cb-30-60220040
* Solicitation Number: 202304999
* Publication Date: 2023-11-23
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-12-18T14:00:00

## Description
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a supplier to provide Mattresses, Prisoner, High Risk in accordance with RCMP Specification G.S. 1045-279 dated 2018-11-20. The requirement includes an optional quantity of 600 mattresses that can be exercised within 36 months of contract award. The procurement is subject to the Ta’an Kwach’an Council Final Agreement and the Kwanlin Dun First Nation Final Agreement.

## Procurement Phases
This procurement will occur in two phases: Expression of Interest and Request for Proposal.

### Phase 1: Expression of Interest
To participate, bidders must submit a completed and signed Submission of Interest form and Non-Disclosure and Confidentiality of Information Agreement (NDCIA) to the Contracting Authority via email.

### Phase 2: Request for Proposal
Bidders who submit a complete and signed Submission of Interest form and NDCIA will receive a copy of the Request for Proposal, specifications, and associated documentation (solicitation package).

## Tendering Information
* Tendering method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Basis of selection: Responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price
* Evaluation criteria: Lowest price
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and others.
* Regions of opportunity: Worldwide
* Regions of delivery: Canada

## Contact Information
* Contracting Authority: Trina Nurse, Royal Canadian Mounted Police, Procurement, Materiel and Assets Management Branch
* Email: Trina.Nurse@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* Address: 73 Leikin Drive, Mailstop #1, Ottawa, ON K1A 0R2

## Important Notes
* Canada reserves the right to modify, change, or terminate the procurement at any time.
* Canada will not be responsible for any failure attributable to the transmission or receipt of submissions of interest.
